price: 7. Tačiau tie, kas kėsinasi virš to, tada jie yra nusidėjėliai.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
